programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn fe awn i'r Bahamas ac i Florida i gwrdd a'r Fflamingo a'r Dolffin. The journey takes us to the Bahamas and to Florida to meet the Flamingo and the Dolphin.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae gelynion y cwningod yn dod at ei gilydd i gynllunio sut i gael gwared ar y Guto Gwningen felltith am byth. The predators devise a plan to get rid of Guto Gwningen once and for all!

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y mr-ladron sy'n ymuno Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Odo is a brand new animated series for preschool kids all over the world. Comedy driven stories about a little owl who believes in himself.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, a phan mae o'n hapus mae o'n hoffi fflapio ei freichiau. Palo flaps so much that he flies away and the Book Animals have to track him down.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Byddwn yn teithio yn l mewn hanes i ddarganfod mwy am ddyfais glyfar iawn, y cwmpawd, a sut oedd y cwmpawd yn helpu pobl. We'll travel back in history to discover more about compasses.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n gwneud ffilmiau! Ond mae Pip yn cael trafferth meddwl beth i'w wneud. On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are making their own movies!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Mae pobol yn mwynhau casglu pob mathau o bethau, ond moch sy'n diddori Gwawr. People enjoy collecting all kinds of things. Today we meet Gwawr, who collects pigs.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae'n heulog ar y traeth heddiw, a phawb angen oeri ychydig. It's sunny on the beach today, and everyone needs to cool off somewhat.

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Taid yn prynu tocynnau i fynd Stiw ac Elsi ar reid mewn balwn aer poeth, ac yn helpu Stiw i beidio bod ofn uchder. Taid gets Stiw and Elsi tickets for a hot-air balloon ride.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae Jen yn edrych ymlaen at chwarae gm o bl-droed gyda Jim. Jen is looking forward to playing a game of football with Jim but they need to create two goals exactly the same size.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae Eryr blin am gadw cath ddireidus i ffwrdd o'i nyth. Mae'n rhaid i Gwil a'r cwn achub y gath a'r cywion eryr. An angry Eagle tries to keep a mischievous cat away from her nest!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw: ymweliad ag Ynys Enlli, antur feicio gyda'r teulu ger Llys y Fran, a cwrdd merch o'r enw Enlli a'i chwn defaid. Join Meleri and Huw on all sorts of adventures in the open air.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cn i helpu plant bach ymgyfarwyddo gyda wyneb cloc a dweud yr amser. A song to help youngsters familiarise themselves with a clock face, and how to tell the time.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Twm Twrch yn hoff iawn o wneud posau, ond nid yw bob amser yn gallu eu datrys - hynny yw, tan bod swyn arbennig yn ei helpu. A spell helps Twm Twrch solve some complicated puzzles!

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Tra mae'r Dreigiau yn chwarae, mae gan Cadi brawf pwysig i'w wneud ar y rheilffordd. While the Dragons play, Cadi has an important test to do at the railway.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae dwr yn diferu o'r to gan dorri ar draws cyngerdd ffidil Crawc. Crawc tries to fix a roof which starts leaking mid-violin performance and discovers the leaks give him a musical bonus.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Pan mae Sami Wisgars a Mr Cadno yn amharu ar aduniad blynyddol Peredur Pysgotwr ar lan y llyn, rhaid i Guto achub y parti. It's up to Guto to save Peredur Pysgotwr's annual get together.

programme.title: Ahoi!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Pan mae Tomi'n methu ffeindio'r trysor mae wedi'i guddio, mae'r Whws yn gweld gwiwer yn palu am rywbeth. When Scotty can't find the treasure he hid, the Woohoos spot a squirrel digging!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae brecwast arbennig ar fwydlen y bwyty heddiw, ond yn anffodus, mae ieir Magi wedi diflannu a hebddyn nhw does dim wyau. Sin is trying a new breakfast menu today, but there are no eggs!

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod sioe Arddangos Llysiau Gorau Pontypandy. Mae'r plant wedi tyfu pwmpen enfawr ond mae Jams a hi yn cael antur a hanner! It's the day of Pontypandy's Best Vegetable Show!

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae Harri yn gwarchod aligator bach ond pan fydd hwnnw'n dianc o'r Octofad, rhaid i Harri a gweddill yr Octonots ei achub. Harri adopts a baby alligator but it escapes!

programme.title: New: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Harri gets a call to the Loggerheads park. He and Aled fix the bug hotel making sure the caterpillar has a safe home. Mae Harri'n cael galwad i barc Loggerheads i drwsio gwesty'r pryfed.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Beth sydd yn codi ofn ar y ceffylau nen heddiw? What is frightening the horses today?

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi'n darganfod nad yw wedi tyfu yn ystod y flwyddyn. Mae o'n cael ei berswadio gan Betsi i drio un o'i swynion tyfu. Betsi persuades Digbi to try one of her simple growing spells.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae gan Cari stori am y capten cychod Twm Sin Jac, a sut cafodd ei gwch cyntaf erioed. Cari has a story about the sea captain, Twm Sin Jac, and how he was given his first boat.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae Ela wedi blino'n ln. A fydd hi'n rhy flinedig i chwarae gm y geiriau? Ela's very tired today but is she too tired to play the word game? Today's words are 'magnifying glass'.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae'r Tralalas yn mynd i'r ysgol heddiw. Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn gwneud llun gyda phensiliau lliwgar. The Tralalas are going to school today where Harmoni, Melodi & Bop draw a picture.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae'n rhaid i Blero rwystro llosgfynydd rhag ffrwydro hyd nes y bydd e wedi cael cyfle i achub yr anifeiliaid sy'n byw yn ei gysgod. Blero has to save the day before a volcano erupts.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen! Welcome to a new series of Jambor.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Jini yn poeni'n fawr am siarad yn gyhoeddus, ond diolch i Joni, mae hi'n dod drosti - mewn da bryd i achub y dydd! Jini is very worried about speaking in public - but Joni can help her!

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Ysgol Login Fach sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Login Fach join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae'n amser gwely yng Nghoeden yr Olobobs ac mae Tib yn cael trafferth cysgu - dydy hwiangerdd swynol Lalw ddim yn helpu hyd yn oed! It's bedtime, and Tib is having trouble sleeping!

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Betsi yn pledio ar Abel i adael iddi fynd pharsel i Digbi er mwyn ymddiheuro iddo. Betsi pleads with Abel to let her deliver Digbi's parcel so she can apologise to him.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Nel yn holi 'Pam bod arogl neis ar flodau?', ac mae Tad-cu'n adrodd stori am arddwr gorau'n byd a'i phridd arbennig. Today Nel asks Tad-cu, 'Why do flowers smell so nice?'.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Cen Twyn wedi creu cerbyd newydd sbon ar olwynion. Cen Twyn has created a brand new vehicle with wheels. Twt achieves one of his dreams and is able to come out of the water.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn archwilio'r holl synau cerddorol ma nhw'n gallu eu creu gyda phethau ma nhw'n eu ffeindio ar yr ynys. Today, the Woohoos explore all the different musical sounds they can make.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae hyder Sin yn suddo pan mae Myrddin - chef sy'n arbenigo mewn ryseitiau mango - yn cyrraedd y pentref. Myrddin arrives with his Marvellous Mango Roadshow!

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Gem ffon yw Hela Pryfed Estron. Mae Norman, Mandy, Sara a Jams yn mwynhau chwarae, efo cystadleuaeth daer rhyngddyn nhw a Siarlys a Meic Flood. The gang play the Alien Bug Hunt phone game.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Pan fydd afiechyd yn taro cymuned o gimychiaid coch, rhaid i'r Octonots frysio i ddod o hyd i driniaeth. When a population of crawfish is struck by illness the Octonauts must find a cure.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Ellie'n galw Harri o gaffi Beca ym Mhontarfynach; does dim dwr yno a'r tap wedi torri. Ellie calls Harri from Beca's cafe in Pontarfynach, they have no water because the tap is broken.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd
programme.desc: Tro hwn, mae Colleen yn creu ryseitiau i greu atgofion teuluol newydd. Colleen Ramsey on food nostalgia. This time she shows us how to create new memories with fresh new family recipes. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Arfordir Cymru: Sir Benfro
programme.desc: Mae'r daith yn mynd ni o Borthgain i Solfach. Byddwn yn ymweld ag Ynys Ddewi a chael hanes twrch rheibus! The journey takes us from Porthgain to Solva with tales of a rampant wild boar!

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn am faterion cefn gwlad. Weekly countryside and farming magazine.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Iolo: Natur Bregus Cymru
programme.desc: Y tro yma, mae Iolo yn chwilio am rywogaethau prinnaf Cymru - llawer ohonyn nhw o dan fygythiad difrifol. Iolo looks for some of Wales' rarest species.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Darllenwch gyda'r Tralalas yn y llyfrgell, ond peidiwch gwneud gormod o swn! Harmoni, Melodi and Bop read a book about chimpanzees, but what was the other one they read about, hmm?

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. Welcome to a new series of Jambor.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Pam bod pengwiniaid ddim yn gallu hedfan? Dyma cwestiwn Ela i Tad-cu heddiw. 'Why can't Penguins fly?' is the question Ela asks Tad-cu today.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae bot danfon parseli'n mynd yn dw-lal, ac yn creu trafferthion mawr ar hyd a lled Dyffryn Dryswch. A parcel delivery bot goes haywire, and creates big problems all over Dyffryn Dyrswch.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Yn siop chips Gareth yr orangwtan, mae'r peiriant chips wedi torri. Mae Harri'n trio helpu Elsie i'w drwsio, ond ma'r radio'n diffodd! The fryer is broken at Gareth the orangutan's chippie!

programme.title: Prys a'r Pryfed
programme.desc: Mae cyfeillgarwch Lloyd ac Abacus yn cael ei brofi pan mae 'na gweryla ynglyn chrysalis. Lloyd and Abacus' friendship is tested when they can't agree on what to do with a chrysalis.

programme.title: Dyffryn Mwmin
programme.desc: Mae Mwmintrol yn wynebu ei her anoddaf pan mae'n deffro'n rhy gynnar o'i gaeafgwsg.To survive the perils of a harsh winter, Moomintrol must find his primal side with the help of an ancestor.

programme.title: New: Mwy o Stwnsh Sadwrn
programme.desc: Cipolwg yn l dros rai o uchafbwyntiau rhaglen dydd Sadwrn. Tune in to relive some of the highlights of Saturday's programme.

programme.title: Ceffylau Cymru
programme.desc: Dau unigolyn sy'n cynnig dulliau gwahanol o ofalu am geffyl, y naill yn ffisiotherapydd a'r llall yn defnyddio triniaeth holistig. A race horse physiotherapist and Bowen therapy for horses.

programme.title: Cymry ar Gynfas
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, yr artist dyfrliw Teresa Jenellen sy'n mynd ati i wneud portread o'r actor Sharon Morgan. This time: Watercolour artist Teresa Jenellen paints a portrait of actor Sharon Morgan.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm
programme.desc: Mae ymweliadau cudd Colin yn dod i'r amlwg, ac mae Tom yn ceisio amddiffyn Gaynor o'r pentref. Colin's secret visits are rumbled and Tom attempts to shield Gaynor from the village.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae hwyliau drwg ar Elliw ac mae Britney yn cael clywed ganddi beth sydd yn ei phoeni. Elliw is in a bad mood and she confides in Britney what is bothering her.

programme.desc: Sgwrsia Elin gyda'r cyn is-bostfeistr, Noel, a aeth i'r carchar, gan golli popeth. Elin chats to former post master Noel Thomas, who talks openly about the Post Office scandal fallout.

programme.title: The Heritage Chart Show with Mike Read
programme.desc: A TOTP style TV Show for Heritage Artists based on the Heritage Chart which is voted on in over 80 countries. Songs you love from popular artists, live and on video with the odd interview.

programme.title: Hannibal Brooks
programme.desc: 1969. War. Directed by Michael Winner. Stars Oliver Reed, John Alderton & Wolfgang Preiss. A POW working at a zoo gets the chance to escape and takes the elephant he's been caring for with him. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed throughout May. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Queue for Gardens
programme.desc: 1968. A delightful trip to Kew Gardens and to Syon Park on the opposite side of the river.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Blood Money. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Ralph Meeker & Robert J. Wilke. Longley stumbles across a cabin, and its dead owner, and is accused by the dead man's brothers of being the killer. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Strained Relations. 1963. Stars David Kossoff, David Jackson & Robert Easton. The Larkins receive news that Jeff is flying in for Christmas and an ulcer hinders Alf's plans to drink heavily. [S]

programme.title: The Sicilians
programme.desc: 1964. Crime. Stars Robert Hutton, Reginald Marsh & Ursula Howells. An aide at the U.S. Embassy finds himself involved with Scotland Yard and the French police after a mafia boss' son is kidnapped. [S]

programme.title: Park Plaza 605
programme.desc: 1953. Crime drama directed by Bernard Knowles. A private detective solves a murder, which he was accused of. Starring Tom Conway, Eva Bartok and Sid James. [S]

programme.title: Kill Me Tomorrow
programme.desc: 1957. Directed by Terence Fisher. Starring Tommy Steele & Pat O'Brien. Crosbie is sacked, but needs his job to fund an operation for his son, only to find his old editor has been murdered. [S]

programme.title: Bombay Waterfront
programme.desc: 1952. Directed by Maclean Rogers and starring John Bentley, Patricia Dainton and Peter Gawthorne. Follows Temple's efforts to aid the police in solving a series of gruesome murders. [S]

programme.title: The Steel Key
programme.desc: 1953. Directed By Robert S. Baker and starring Terence Morgan, Joan Rice and Raymond Lovell. A professor working on a steel formula is murdered. Those after the formula will stop at nothing. [S]

programme.title: The Quiet Woman
programme.desc: 1951. Crime drama directed By John Gilling and starring Derek Bond, Jane Hylton and Dora Bryan. A proprietress of a country inn becomes involved with smugglers. [S]

programme.title: Powderkeg
programme.desc: 1971. Western. Directed by Douglas Heyes. Stars Rod Taylor, Dennis Cole & Fernando Lamas. A light-hearted adventure where a pair of troubleshooters are hired to retrieve a hijacked train. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: A Man for Elly. 1964. Stars Irene Ryan, Donna Douglas & Henry Gibson. Granny spends her time watching her television idol, Western actor Quirt Manly and believes he would be just the man for Elly. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1955. Murder Anonymous. Directed by Ken Hughes. Starring Peter Arne, Ewen Solon and Jill Bennett. An inspector sets out to prove that a blind man murdered his wife's lover. (S1, E14)

programme.title: Dixon of Dock Green
programme.desc: Alice. 1976. Stars Jack Warner, Angela Pleasence & Harry Landis. Alice is determined to be the best violinist in the world - but what price is she prepared to pay? [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Market Day/Minnow Trap/Lobster Boat. 1986. Jack Hargreaves goes shopping at a country market and catches small fish in the nearby stream, before heading out to sea on a lobster trawler. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: Mike and Noel bring news from Tunbridge Wells, wallow in the astounding footage of the building of Rugby's Plaza Cinema and talk the label machines that graced our railway platforms in the 60s. [S]

programme.title: Public Eye
programme.desc: 1973. Detective & Mystery Drama. The Golden Boy. Stars Alfred Burke, Alan Webb & Richard Hurndall. Marker investigates why a man who had everything gave it all up and disappeared. [S]

programme.title: The Last Man on Earth
programme.desc: 1964. Horror. Directed by Ubaldo Ragona & Sidney Salkow. Stars Vincent Price & Franca Bettoia. When a disease turns all humans into vampiric zombies, the last man on earth must fight to survive.

programme.title: Spring and Port Wine
programme.desc: 1970. Drama. Director: Peter Hammond. Stars James Mason, Diana Coupland, Hannah Gordon. A stern father and lenient mother try to deal with the ups and downs of their four children's lives. [S]

programme.title: Penny Gold
programme.desc: 1973. Drama. Director Jack Cardiff. Stars James Booth, Francesca Annis & Nicky Henson. Mathew is determined to crack the murder of a young woman whose body is identified by her identical twin. [S]

programme.title: Penny Gold
programme.desc: 1973. Drama. Director Jack Cardiff. Stars James Booth, Francesca Annis & Nicky Henson. Mathew is determined to crack the murder of a young woman whose body is identified by her identical twin. [S]

programme.title: Doublecross
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Director Anthony Squire. Stars Donald Houston, Fay Compton, William Hartnell. A Cornish poacher clashes with dangerous international spies. [S]

programme.title: A Home for Max Miller
programme.desc: A delightful and entertaining film about the on-going search to find a permanent home in Brighton for the mass of Max Miller memorabilia The Max Miller Appreciation Society holds. [S]

programme.title: Where Strangers Meet
programme.desc: 1951. A magnificent travelogue about Soho, featuring the streets, businesses and people you would find in this area of London in the 1950s.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Wyatt Earp Becomes a Marshal. 1955. Stars Hugh O'Brian, Mason Alan Dinehart & Denver Pyle. The career of the famous Western lawman begins after he takes over for the murdered sheriff of Ellsworth. [S]

programme.title: The Gentle Trap
programme.desc: 1960. A locksmith on his first burglary is on the run when a rival gang wants his haul. Stars Spencer Teakle & Martin Benson. [S]

programme.title: Bond of Fear
programme.desc: 1956. Crime Drama. Directed by Henry Cass. Stars Dermot Walsh and Jane Barrett. Filmed at Nettlefold. A man and his family on a caravan holiday in France are taken hostage by an escaped convict. [S]

programme.title: Gaolbreak
programme.desc: 1962. Directed by Francis Searle and starring Peter Reynolds, Avice Landon and David Kernan. A mother and her two sons run a newsagents as a front for their criminal activity. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance: Here Comes the Suit
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Director: Richard Kinon. Stars David Niven, Jesse White, Allison Hayes. A timid businessman becomes the centre of attention after getting a new suit from a shady tailor.

programme.title: The Paper Gallows
programme.desc: 1950. Thriller. Directed by John Guillermin. Stars John Bentley, Dermot Walsh & Rona Anderson. A crime novelist, jealous over his secretary's affection for his brother, decides to murder her. [S]

programme.title: Nearest and Dearest
programme.desc: 1972. Comedy. Directed by John Robins. Stars Hylda Baker, Jimmy Jewel & Edward Malin. After their father's death, two siblings inherit a decrepit pickle factory and attempt to keep it afloat. [S]

programme.title: Make Me An Offer
programme.desc: 1954. Comedy. Directed by Cyril Frankel. Starring Peter Finch. The story of Charlie, who as a boy fell in love with a Portland Vase on a trip to a museum, pursues his dream as an antiques dealer. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Digging Up the Past
programme.desc: 1964. A remarkable view of an archaeological dig by both professionals and amateurs to discover ancient Roman remains.

programme.title: The History Of Mr Polly
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Director: Anthony Pelissier. Stars John Mills, Betty Ann Davies, Megs Jenkins, Moore Marriott & Finlay Currie. Alfred reluctantly uses inherited money on two big ventures. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: Locker Sixty-Nine. 1962. Directed by Norman Harrison. Stars Eddie Byrne, Paul Daneman & Penelope Horner. A private detective is knocked unconscious after finding the body of his employer. [S]

programme.title: Man from Interpol
programme.desc: All the Dead Were Harrisons. 1960. Stars Richard Stapley, Marguerite Brennan & Geoffrey Denton. Scotland Yard is puzzled by the mysterious deaths of several people, all with the surname Harrison. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Greatest Mother of Them All. 1966. Stars Adam West, Shelley Winters & Tisha Sterling. The infamous Ma Parker and her fiendish children raid Gotham's Ladies Auxiliary's Mother of the Year Awards. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Fashions in crime. 1958. Stars Rober Beatty, Gerald Case & Olga Dickie. A top designer claims his work is being plagiarised. Maguire believes the complaint does not warrant immediate attention. [S]

programme.title: Nor the Moon By Night
programme.desc: 1958. Adventure. Director: Ken Annakin. Stars Michael Craig, Belinda Lee, Patrick McGoohan. After a the loss of her mother, a young women sets out to find her African pen pal. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro is here to embark on a journey of terror with you tonight. First up, is the 1996 supernatural horror Amityville: Dollhouse, where evil lurks in a young girl's doll house. [S]

programme.title: Amityville: Dollhouse
programme.desc: 1996. Horror. Director: Steve White. Stars Robin Thomas, Starr Andreeff & Allen Cutler. A girl inadvertently releases evil spirits lurking within her toy house, which wreak havoc upon her family. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: We venture into the paranormal in Caroline Munro's next offering - 100 Years of Horror. This documentary, presented by the legendary Christopher Lee, explores the history of classic horror films. [S]

programme.desc: 5/35. Chris and Lee are in Stone to create a fun family garden for Chloe and her daughters that also serves as a space to remember their late husband and dad Errol.

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: 05/35. Flo and Charlie are in Leicester to create a safe garden for visually impaired Luigi and his wife Julie. It needs to be an easy-to-navigate space without any trip hazards.

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: Simon gives Mair and Dafydd the cash to buy, renovate and sell a historic chapel in Neath. But even with Simon's help and a generous budget, can they restore this local landmark and sell it on?

programme.title: Tool Club
programme.desc: 7/15. The Many Tears animal rescue centre makeover continues. A tired kitchen gets a new lease of life and battered skateboard decks are turned into a bird feeder.

programme.title: Farmers Country Showdown
programme.desc: 20/20. The Akikis with their biodynamic fruit and veg - and cheesemaking Spierings - sell their produce at one of London's oldest farmers markets. Last in series.

programme.title: Bill Bailey's Australian Adventure
programme.desc: 2/4. Bill samples the laid-back red-dirt lifestyle, goes swimming with friendly whale sharks and visits the awesome Pink Lakes. There are also wild emus - and they're hungry.

programme.desc: Simon gives Mair and Dafydd the cash to buy, renovate and sell a historic chapel in Neath. But even with Simon's help and a generous budget, can they restore this local landmark and sell it on?

programme.title: My Floating Home
programme.desc: 2/8. Alan and Val put their savings on the line for a high-tech boat to help them spend time with their family. But first they need to learn how to live on the water.

programme.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: 1/8. A look behind the scenes at a dairy farm to see how they manage demand for milk. The sugar content of yoghurt. Sian looks into dairy alternatives.
